name: TRACE (itch) (Relapse Nidus)
description:
The game is built on projections. Each side of the cube is a view of the snake from different angles: from above, in front and in profile.

Your task is to connect the three projections into a single whole.

The WASD buttons turn the head, select the direction of movement. 
W is responsible for moving up, D for moving down.
